Package com.healthcare.service

Class PatientService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.healthcare.service.PatientService
  • @Service
public class PatientService
extends java.lang.Object
    Patient Controller is the Rest controller API for performing operations like Save patient , read patient , update and delete patient.

    Lovelesh
